resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
This is the Introduction where customer will get to know the significance and necessity of Table Booking Service. Please Enter the following Information :
Wait a Little bit for verification
We will Verify Your Phone Number by Sending OTP to your given Mobile Number. Please Enter OTP quickly after received. \nThank You !!
Your Verification is Successful.We will contact you for further confirmation. The Booking ID given below is the key before arrival. Thanks for Booking Table
